scripts.build: bun build src/server/index.tsx --outdir dist-server --target node && bun build:client
scripts.build:client: bun build src/client/app/index.tsx --outdir dist/assets --entry-naming [name].js && bun build src/client/com/index.tsx --outdir dist/assets --entry-naming [name].js && bun build src/client/org/index.tsx --outdir dist/assets --entry-naming [name].js
scripts.preview: bun run build && bunx wrangler dev dist-server/index.js
scripts.deploy: bun run build && bunx wrangler deploy dist-server/index.js
scripts.typecheck: bunx tsc --noEmit -p tsconfig.server.json && bunx tsc --noEmit -p tsconfig.client.json
